entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #53744
  • Invalid List Of Components when using "required" keyword #53742
  • Isolated JS for RazorComponentResult #53741
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #53740
  • Add appsettings.json JSON schemas for areas that aren't already in the schema store #53737
  • Kestrel occasionally losing zero-size GRPC responses #53736
  • ControllerBase.Created returns NoContent and Ok results #53734
  • .Net 8 Blazor Web App Identity Framework Help #53732
  • OnConnectedAsync ist sometimes called with the wrong HubConnectionContext #53731
  • Blazor Server page crashing after reconnect with multiple clients #53730
    8.0.x
  • Quickgrid table design problem #53729
  • Configuration Bind error with common pattern in PublishTrimmed #53728
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https, mvc #53727
  • Perf improvement: json #53726
  • Quarantine MouseOverAndMouseOut_CanTrigger #53724
    9.0-preview3
  • Quarantine CounterPageCanUseThreads #53723
    9.0-preview3
  • blazor server firefox Uncaught (in promise) WebSocket is not in the OPEN state #53721
  • IdentityCookieAuthenticationBuilderExtensions causing 404 Not Found #53719

Closed

  • The content of nuget package is not being copied to the project source code folder physically. They are only appears as if under the project folder #53747
  • Blazor Server folder publish fails for specific configurations #53714
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, json #53626
  • Error AuthenticationStateProvider in Net8 #53651
  • Api endpoint does not properly unescape strange string #53701
  • Not rendering full page #53527
  • Pls enhance the docs about Action injection with FromServices #53722
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction, plaintext #53615
  • Perf regression: json, json #53648
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53713
  • In RCL, how to deploy reusable .scss files using nuget in .NET Blazor project instead of npm while can be referenced (using @import) by other .scss within project folder? #53682
  • Minimal API with IFormFile throws when request body is missing and Content-Type header is missing or empty #53630

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53748
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53746
    area-blazor
  • Quarantine RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #53745
    area-networking
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #53735
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53500
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview2
  • Return unsuccessful when trying to read form and request does not have body #53680
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview2
  • Quarantine e2e components tests #53725
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Enable use of RestoreConfigFile property in source-build #53738
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/9.0-preview1] Package debs with xz compression #53718
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Package debs with xz compression #53717
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Add milestones for preview2 #53743
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/8.0] Fix navigation for anchor inside <svg> element #53541
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53542
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53604
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
